page.title: 10CHART ENGINEERING PIVINGTON
page.content: Chart Engineering are one of the largest employers at Pivington Mill, employing 32 people. They design and make precast moulds for concrete. These range from making casts for pipe lines to designing concrete stabbits for breakwaters. The designs are first made in cardboard and the final casts are made from steel. They have designed moulds for breakwaters to be used in the Carribean called stabbits. These are taken to Cambridgeshire where the concrete stabbits are made and then shipped to their destination.
